keyword: how many calories in a ritz cracker
title: How Many Calories in a Ritz Cracker?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a ritz cracker, including carbs, fat, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown per cracker with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Ritz Cracker?
assumptions: Standard original Ritz cracker, approximately 5 g each, plain without toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, batch, and serving size. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A single Ritz cracker contains about 13 kcal, mostly from carbs and a bit of fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add a slice of cheddar cheese

faqs.q: How many calories in a ritz cracker?
faqs.a: Approximately 13 kcal per standard Ritz cracker.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one Ritz cracker?
faqs.a: About 1.7 g carbs, with 0.1 g fiber and 0.2 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Ritz crackers?
faqs.a: One cracker has around 25 mg sodium; it adds up with multiple servings.

faqs.q: How much fat in a single Ritz cracker?
faqs.a: Roughly 0.6 g total fat, including 0.1 g saturated fat.
